participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.background: I'm proud of my ability to sew and create clothes that are both stylish and unique. I love to work with my hands and create things. I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience. I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party. I am single and enjoy my independence.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly, outdoorsy, and a bit of a dreamer.
participant_2.background: I'd brag about my amazing dog and how he's always there for me. I work in IT. My hobbies include photography and hiking. I am a lumberjack. I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going great! I just got back from hiking and it was beautiful out.
I love hiking! I went to New Orleans for Mardi Gras and hiked up to the top of the levee to get a view of the city. It was amazing!
That sounds like an awesome experience! I've never been to New Orleans but it's on my list of places to visit.
You should definitely go! It's such a fun city and the food is amazing.
I've heard the food is incredible! What's your favorite thing you've eaten there?
I have a few favorites but the beignets from Cafe du Monde are definitely up there.
I've heard about those! I'll have to try them next time I'm there.
They're amazing! You won't be disappointed.
Well, I guess I know what I'm having for breakfast the next time I'm in New Orleans!
